title: mUSD Treasury Diversification - Assets
body:
It is proposed to diversify the mStableDAO's USD treasury from being 100% in mUSD, into another stablecoin. This is being done to manage risk ahead of the mUSD contract upgrade, which will see the deployment of a new AMM and bAsset selection. 

Whilst we have the utmost confidence in the integrity of mStable's code and the risk protections built into the protocol, smart contract upgrades represent a potential opportunity for "black swan" events.  Thus we believe this diversification to be responsible management of the USD treasury given the circumstances.

**If you are for the diversification of the mStableDAO's USD treasury, which alternative USD stablecoin should be held alongside mUSD?**
author: 0x4B37BbC8CAb32aade27Ce8b1bb2A9E614de81E03
